front.title: Gang Leader
front.setup: At the start of the game Lung enters play Gang Leader side up. Put Brute into play, Gang Leader side up.
front.gameplay: When the villain trash is shuffled into the villain deck, flip Brute, and flip Lung.
front.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, discard the top 3 cards of the villain deck

back.title: Dragon Awoken

gameplay.p: When flipped to this side, destroy all villain cards in play and put all cards in the villain deck into the villain trash.
Reduce damage dealt to Lung by 2.

back.advanced: When flipped to this side, the heroes lose the game

text.p: If there are 10 or more cards in the villain trash, reduce damage dealt to Lung by 1.

At the end of the villain turn play the top card of the villain deck, then:
Lung deals X melee damage to all hero targets, where X = 1 + the number of cards in the villain trash / 5 then,
If there are 5 or more cards in the villain trash, Lung regains 1 HP then,
If there are 15 or more cards in the villain trash, Lung regains 1 HP.
Lung is immune to damage dealt by Environment cards.

At the end of the villain turn:
Lung deals 6 melee and 2 irreducible fire damage to all hero targets then,
Lung regains 3 HP then,
Destroy H hero ongoing or equipment cards.

card.name: Burst of Flame
card.text: Lung deals the hero target with the highest HP X fire damage, where X = 1 + the number of cards in the villain trash / 2

card.name: Smash
card.text: Lung deals the hero target with the lowest HP 2 melee damage. Destroy 1 hero ongoing or equipment card

card.name: Growing Anger
card.text: Discard the top 3 cards of the villain deck. Play the top card of the villain deck

card.name: Wings
card.text: Lung is immune to damage from Environment cards

card.name: White-Hot Flame
card.text: Fire damage dealt by Lung is irreducible

card.name: Pyrokinesis
card.text: Whenever Lung deals melee damage to a target, Lung deals 2 fire damage to that target

card.name: Terrible Burns
card.text: Whenever a hero is dealt fire damage by Lung, destroy 1 hero ongoing or equipment card. At the end of the villain turn, Lung deals the hero target with the highest HP H - 2 fire damage

card.name: Bakuda
card.text: At the start of the villain turn, reveal the top card of the villain deck. If it is a one-shot, Bakuda deals 5 fire damage to all non-villain targets. If it is an ongoing, each hero discards 1 card. If it is a target, the hero with the most cards in play destroys all of them

card.name: Oni Lee
card.text: At the end of the villain turn, Oni Lee deals the hero target with the lowest HP 3 melee damage. Whenever Oni Lee would take damage, reveal the top card of the villain deck. If it is a one-shot prevent the damage. Shuffle the revealed card back into the villain deck

card.name: ABB Thugs
card.text: At the end of the villain turn, ABB Thugs deal the hero target with the lowest HP 2 projectile damage
